definition: to hire (an employee)/to accept (a manuscript) for publication
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to assess sb's capabilities and employ him accordingly (idiom); to employ sb competent for the task

sentences.english: All papers accepted will be indexed by ISTP.
sentences.chinese: 所有錄用論文將被ISTP檢索。

sentences.english: Bill: Uhuh. Well maybe you could do a trial run before you start officially.
sentences.chinese: 噢，那你是否可以在正式錄用之前先試工呢？

sentences.english: If Wang Ling is accepted, she will begin her work in the hotel very soon.
sentences.chinese: 如果王玲被錄用的話，她將很快在賓館開始工作。

sentences.english: I: If you are hired, when can you start work?
sentences.chinese: 如果你被錄用，什麼時候你能開始工作？

sentences.english: Hey Kim, come over here . Have you been hired ?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，基姆，過來一下，你被錄用了嗎？

sentences.english: Schwimmer was the first actor in the ensemble cast to be hired.
sentences.chinese: 修蒙是在合奏第一的演員被錄用。

sentences.english: Article 26 Before recruiting and employing public servants, a public notice of entrance examination shall be issued.
sentences.chinese: 第二十六條錄用公務員，應當發佈招考公告。

sentences.english: Have you received any offers sofar?
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，你收到過錄用通知書嗎？

sentences.english: All the employees of the formal employ favourable welfare treatment.
sentences.chinese: 凡經正式錄用的員工提供優厚的福利待遇。

sentences.english: ; once hired, he was dispatched to the company office in Geneva.
sentences.chinese: 他一被錄用，便被派到設在日內瓦的分公司工作去了。

sentences.english: Apply for staying and performing, if reaching certain criteria.
sentences.chinese: 凡是達到功效申請留本門表演團隊的弟子，擇優錄用。

sentences.english: If less than 5 years, could be engineer.
sentences.chinese: 少於5年者，可作爲工程師錄用。

sentences.english: If you do not receive an offer, ask about the next step in the process.
sentences.chinese: 如果你沒有得到錄用，要詢問下一步還可以做什麼。

sentences.english: By now might use the fuzzy synthesis decision-making method to carry on hires according to qualification .
sentences.chinese: 這時就可以利用模糊綜合決策方法來進行擇優錄用。

sentences.english: The qualifications did not include the ability to sing and dance.
sentences.chinese: 在錄用資格條件中並不包括要能歌善舞。

sentences.english: I didn't pull any strings. You were admitted in your own right.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有走後門，你是憑自己的實力被錄用的。

definition: employee/person employed in a trade or profession
to enter oneself for an examination
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
joint signatures (on a letter or declaration)
